name: Kingdom of Knights (Canceled)
blurb: If you like Medieval Video Games, Building Your Own Castles, And Fighting In Large Scale Combat. This Kickstarter is for you!

rewards.reward: PASSING BY - We understand you want to show your support without the big hail to Avalon. We thank you for giving what you can!

THE PEASANT: The Peasant allows you to receive $5.00 in game diamonds, and also you will get a special backer tag. That way everyone in Avalon knows, you are special. This name is also included in every tier above.

THE ROYALIST: In Game Store Credit of $10.00, you never lose a dime, you get back most of the money you put in! On top of that, it comes with a Royalist Badge, a unique and special supporter icon, that is exclusive to those on Kickstarter. These badges are shown in our forums. This is an exclusive to this tier, you have to purchase Royalist to get the badge.

$25 - The Squire:\u00a0The Squire receives $20.00 of rewards in game diamonds. On top of that, this tier and all tiers above are guaranteed access to the Private Beta Version of the game.\u00a0You will also get an exclusive banner for your city that denotes you as a proud backer of the game. Anyone visiting your city will know you were there from the beginning. Lastly, you will be mentioned in the credits.

THE FOOT SOLDIER: In Game Store Credit of $35.00. YOU KEEP everything you spent! You will also get access to a unique flag/banner set in game. You will get also a mention in the game credits, as an important contributor to the game. Access to the Private Beta Version of the game.

$50 - The Archer:\u00a0In-game store credit of $50.00.\u00a0You will be given access to a high quality digital painting. YOU KEEP everything you spent!\u00a0You will have access to the Private Beta Version of the game and access to the unique flag and banner set to decorate your town. Mention in the credits.

THE KNIGHT:  In Game Store Credit of Diamonds Equivalent of $110.00. Access to the Private Beta Version of the game. Access to the unique flag and banner set to decorate your town. Further more you will be given access to a high quality digital painting. Email Updates of Game Progress. Free Game Poster. Mention in the credits.

THE LORD:  In Game Store Credit of $220. Access to the Private Beta Version of the game. Access to the unique flag and banner set to decorate your town. Further more you will be given access to a high quality digital painting. Email Updates of Game Progress. Free Game Poster. Weekly Game Art Updates. Mention in the credits. Free T-Shirt.

$500 - The King: \u00a0In Game Store Credit of $500. You will have access to the developer chat room! You get to speak one on one with the developers and witness the game as it is being created. We will even ask you for input. Put your touch on a truly unique game as a part of this unique journey. No other game offers this reward! On top of all of that, you will have access to the Private Beta Version of the game, access to the unique flag and banner set to decorate your town, and access to a high quality digital painting. You will receive Email updates of the development of the Game Kingdom of Knights, a free game poster, a free T-Shirt,\u00a0and weekly game art updates. Mention in the credits.

$1000 - The High Lord of Avalon:\u00a0 In Game Store Credit of $500. You will get a NPC created after you! We will request a picture of yourself, and soon you will have your name and face inside the game, forever for all to see.\u00a0On top of this, you will have access to the Private Beta Version of the game, access to the unique flag and banner set to decorate your town, and access to a high quality digital painting. You will receive Email updates of the development of the Game Kingdom of Knights. You will get a free game poster, weekly game art updates, a free T-Shirt and mention in the credits.\u00a0You will have access to the developer chat room  to speak one on one with the developers and witness the game as it is being created. Put your touch on a truly unique game, and be part of the journey.

The Heroes of Avalon:\u00a0In Game Store Credit of $500. We will create a Hero after you! Send us your picture and let us know what abilities you'd like to have and your preference of weapons and clothing. Our artist will work with you, and show you a Hero you can place as a new profile picture on Facebook! On top of this, you will have access to the Private Beta Version of the game, access to the unique flag and banner set to decorate your town, and access to a high quality digital painting. You will receive Email updates of the development of the Game Kingdom of Knights. You will get a free game poster, weekly game art updates, a free T-Shirt and mention in the credits.\u00a0You will have access to the developer chat room  to speak one on one with the developers and witness the game as it is being created. Put your touch on a truly unique game, and be part of the journey.
